amendment.description: To convert appropriations transer authority in section 123 to authority for transfers of authorizations of appropriations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3278 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3278 proposed by Senator Dole for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S6433-6435; text: CR S6435) To convert appropriations transer authority in section 123 to authority for transfers of authorizations of appropriations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3278 proposed by Senator Dole for Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3278 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
